base_description: Compact, multi-tool knife, blue and black handle.
part_description: Features multiple silver blades and tools folding into a blue and black handle. Blades vary in shape and size, positioned centrally, with tools extending outward. Handle has a curved design for grip.
internal_interaction_description: The blades and tools are hinged at one end, allowing them to fold into the handle for compact storage. Each tool can be individually extended or retracted, locking into place for use. The handle provides slots for each tool, ensuring secure placement and easy access.
external_interaction_description: The multi-tool interacts with external elements through its blades and tools, used for cutting, opening, or adjusting various items. The ergonomic handle offers a secure grip for the user, enhancing precision and control during use. It is portable, fitting into pockets or bags for convenient access.
